Texto: 
conservative treatment
sclerotic line perpendicular to the trabeculae in the posterior calcaneus.  patient is s/p arthrodesis to first ip, with ankylosis at this joint.  calcaneal spur noted.
calcaneal stress fracture
calcaneal spur, bone contusion
50 yo woman with no significant past medical history with a 4 week history of gradually increasing foot pain, worse  with and now limiting her daily walks.
the calcaneal spur could be a confounding and distracting finding if the calcaneus is not appropriately examined.
